name: ynt
description: Stop YouTube's automatic translations! This extension keeps titles, descriptions and video audio in their original language.

scripts.create-dirs: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/content dist/background dist/styles dist/assets/icons
scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:firefox && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:chrome && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:safari: npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:safari && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:common: npm run build:polyfill && npm run build:content && npm run build:popup && npm run build:background && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run copy:scripts && npm run post:build
scripts.build:html: cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp src/popup/welcome.html dist/popup/
scripts.copy:scripts: mkdir -p dist/content/scripts && cp src/content/audio/audioScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/description/descriptionScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/subtitles/subtitlesScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/titles/mainTitleScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/channelName/channelNameScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/description/timestampScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/description/searchDescriptionScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/titles/browsingTitlesFallbackScript.js dist/content/scripts/ && cp src/content/scripts/createIsolatedPlayerScript.js dist/content/scripts/
scripts.package: npm run package:firefox && npm run package:chrome && npm run post:web-ext
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && npm run web-ext:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && npm run web-ext:chrome
scripts.prepare:safari: npm run build:safari && npm run copy:safari && npm run setup:safari
scripts.copy:safari: rm -rf safari-extension/YouTube\ No\ Translation/YouTube\ No\ Translation/Resources/dist && cp -r dist safari-extension/YouTube\ No\ Translation/YouTube\ No\ Translation/Resources/

author: YouGo
